articles.title: Scientists detect light passing through entire human head, opening new doors for brain imaging
articles.description: For decades, scientists have used near-infrared light to study the brain in a noninvasive way. This optical technique, known as fNIRS (functional near-infrared spectroscopy), measures how light is absorbed by blood in the brain, to infer activity.
articles.content:

articles.title: Philippines urges de-escalation in Middle East after Israel's airstrikes on Iran
articles.description: The Philippines on Friday has called on concerned countries to de-escalate the situation in the Middle East after Israel's airstrikes on Iran.
articles.content:
